name: Talonflame
author: KEIICHIRO ITO
flavor_text: Talonflame mainly preys upon other bird Pokémon. To intimidate opponents, it sends embers spewing from gaps between its feathers.

attacks.name: Quick Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Merciless Strike
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.
